thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sichuan Kelun Pharmaceutical unit receives approval for construction of engineering technology center

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sichuan Kelun Pharmaceutical unit receives approval for construction of engineering technology center

organizations.name: reuters) - sichuan kelun pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Jan 16(Reuters) - Sichuan Kelun Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Says co’s biotechnology unit received approval from Ministry of Environmental Protection of the People’s Republic of China, for construction of environmental protection antibiotic residue harmless treatment and resource utilization related engineering technology center
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/BF6fho
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
